snippet: About 295,000 babies were born in 2013 to undocumented parents, down from a peak of about 370,000 in 2007.
abstract: Pew Research Center study reports number of births to undocumented parents in United States dropped from 370,000 in 2007 to 295,000 in 2013; Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump calls for repeal to birthright citizenship law and would deport all undocumented immigrants and their children regardless of citizenship status.
lead_paragraph: About 295,000 babies were born in 2013 to undocumented parents, down from a peak of about 370,000 in 2007.
